channel.title: CVE Feed for Rockwell Automation -- Pavilion8®
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Rockwell Automation -- Pavilion8®

item.title: CVE-2024-40620|2024-08-14T20:30:57.375Z -- rockwell%20automation -- pavilion8%C2%AE
item.description:
CVE-2024-40620 IMPACT
A vulnerability exists in the affected product due to lack of encryption of sensitive information. The vulnerability results in data being sent between the Console and the Dashboard without encryption, which can be seen in the logs of proxy servers, potentially impacting the data's confidentiality.

item.title: CVE-2024-6435|2024-07-19T17:34:25.778Z -- rockwell%20automation -- pavilion8%C2%AE
item.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability exists in the affected products which could allow a malicious user with basic privileges to access functions which should only be available to users with administrative level privileges. If exploited, an attacker could read sensitive data, and create users. For example, a malicious user with basic privileges could perform critical functions such as creating a user with elevated privileges and reading sensitive information in the “views” section.
